comments.body: Is this change safe to do? Does it change anything this takes in more than 1 argument?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -190,5 +190,5 @@ runAlternateBoot() {
   local bootpropsfile="$1"
   shift
   addJava "-Dsbt.boot.properties=$bootpropsfile"
-  run $@
+  run "$@"

comments.body: This should be harmless, AFAIK. But it does not help either. So I will get rid of this.

-  run $@

comments.body: Him what about this one? If we have multiple arguments this is gonna group them together. Do we want that?
Ah yes, getting rid of them(and alike) as well.
